document_data.name: Temple of the Primordial
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of the Primordial''' was a temple found in [[Mount Hotenow]] that housed a [[cult of Maegera|cult]] of fire-worshiping beings that venerated the sleeping [[Dawn Titan]] [[Maegera]].
document_data.Location: It was found deep within the heart of Mount Hotenow, far beneath its caldera.
document_data.Structure: The temple was a sprawling structure that utilized the natural formations found within the volcanic mountain and stone constructs, such as bridges that spanned deep chasms that led down to rivers of magma.
document_data.History: The temple was constructed by [[Gommoth]] the Twisted some time after the eruption of Mount Hotenow in the {{YearlinkName|1451}}. It remained in use by the cult of Maegera until the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, when the [[Hero of the Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] was enlisted by the dwarves of the [[Clan Hillborn|Hillborn]] expedition to stop Gommoth's schemes to reawaken the dormant fire primordial, and slay the mad giant.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Fire giant]] members of the cult dwelled within the temple, alongside other beings that shared an affinity for the element of fire, including  [[fire archon]]s, [[flamespiker]]s, and [[magma brute]]s.
